meanings.definition: A former gold coin of various European countries.
meanings.sent1: In the past, people used ryals to buy things like we use dollars now.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed ancient ryals from different European nations.
meanings.sent3: The pirate's treasure chest was full of shiny ryals, making him the richest pirate in the land.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as precious as a ryal, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The sun reflected off the ryals, creating a dazzling display of light.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Yemen.
meanings.sent1: In Yemen, people use ryals to pay for goods and services.
meanings.sent2: She exchanged her dollars for Yemeni ryals before her trip.
meanings.sent3: The street vendor happily accepted the ryals for the delicious falafel.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was worth more than all the ryals in the world.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the ryals clinking together was music to his ears.
